snippet: WHITMAN--Helen. Mother, sister, friend. August 11, 1927 - January 15, 2016. The life of the party is gone, and we must move on. Rest in peace my dearest. Your loving sister, Gloria 1/3
lead_paragraph: WHITMAN--Helen. Mother, sister, friend. August 11, 1927 - January 15, 2016. The life of the party is gone, and we must move on. Rest in peace my dearest. Your loving sister, Gloria 1/3
